text: Marie Picasso (born 24 April 1979) is a Swedish reality show star, model and singer who rose to fame in 2002 when she was a housemate on Big Brother. She later got a job as a game show host on TV4 leading two different game shows. In 2007 she entered Idol 2007 where she is currently in the top 10 of the Swedish version of Pop Idol. Picasso won Pop idol on 7 December 2007 in Globen Arena in Stockholm with 51,3% of the votes and she won over the first runner up Amanda Jenssen. Her debut single is called "This Moment". == Source == *From Big Brother to Idol 2007 ==Other websites== Category:1979 births Category:Big Brother contestants Category:Living people Category:Reality show winners Category:Swedish models Category:Swedish singers
title: Marie Picasso
